metadata.title: CVE-2022-37603 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A Regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) flaw was found in Function interpolateName in interpolateName.js in webpack loader-utils 2.0.0 via the url variable in interpolateName.js.

criterions.comment: node-loader-utils package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
